name: Banana Bread
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups mashed bananas (about 4 large) 1 tsp. salt
steps: Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs then bananas. Sift dry ingredients and add to mixture. Fold in nuts.
½ cup softened butter 1 tsp vanilla
Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs. Add mashed bananas, buttermilk, and vanilla. Add dry ingredients. Pour into 3
greased loaf pans or muffin tins. (I prefer muffin tins. Mini muffin tins work great too. Just bake them for a shorter
period of time). *Sprinkle sugar over the top of each loaf or muffin. It will crystallize and give it a flakey, delicious
crust. Bake loaves at 350° for 45-­‐55 minutes. Bake muffins 18-­‐23 minutes, depending on your oven.
